summary: This document appears to be an email chain from August 2019 forwarding various attachments related to Jeffrey Epstein's detention and monitoring at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, including 30-minute rounds logs, photographs, staff rosters, and emergency contacts, sent shortly before his death.

events.title: 30-Minute Rounds Logging at MCC
events.description: Documentation of 30-minute monitoring rounds for Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: 30-Minute Rounds Logging at MCC
events.description: Continued documentation of 30-minute monitoring rounds for Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: 30-Minute Rounds Logging and Photographs
events.description: Documentation of 30-minute monitoring rounds and photographs taken of Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

keyFacts: The email forwards multiple documents related to Jeffrey Epstein's detention monitoring from August 8-10, 2019.
Attachments include 30-minute rounds logs, photographs of Epstein, staff rosters, emergency contacts, and sentry documentation.
This correspondence occurred on August 11, 2019, just one day before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019 (note: date discrepancy - email date is after the documented events).
The documents suggest intensive monitoring protocols were in place for Epstein during his detention.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text excerpt, only document titles and dates.
